body:
So I discovered a cool defense strategy
I call it the fake door

you would understand why when u see the pictures


Most maps have wools. Now here is the defense layout

http://imgur.com/ydo5b9j
Oh no! I forgot to patch up part of the wall

but the truth is...
you can't enter from that area
these carpets make it look like you can enter it from that gate
http://imgur.com/c9VCwRf
the fences on the bottom make the block higher but the carpet makes that fence disappear. The Fence still registers as a taller block then normal and therefore makes it so you can't enter it
That is why it is called the "fake door"
thanks

title: ProfessorUtonium's Defense Trick

replies.body:
That's actually pretty cool!


And looking back on the tournament, I remember than Peruan Combo used carpets at one point. They might have done this.
